thread.title: Israeli researchers all abuzz about orgasmic fruit flies

title: Israeli researchers all abuzz about orgasmic fruit flies
text:
Israeli researchers all abuzz about orgasmic fruit flies 3:32pm IST - 01:39
Male fruit flies enjoy sex more than alcohol, according to Israeli researchers who hope to apply that discovery to controlling human substance abuse. Amy Pollock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Male fruit flies enjoy sex more than alcohol, according to Israeli researchers who hope to apply that discovery to controlling human substance abuse. Amy Pollock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2FZPlyf
